did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Leather bound books, 1808-1847.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Multi-volume sets in leather bindings. Textbooks and standard reference works on the subjects of law and mathematics.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Multi-volume sets in leather bindings. Textbooks and standard reference works on the subjects of law and mathematics.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Leather bound books, #8008. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Archbold, John Frederick. The practice of the Court of King's bench in personal actions, and ejectment. New York, Gould, 1823. v.1-2
Bacon, Matthew. A new abridgement of the law. Phildelphia, Farrand and Nicholas, 1811. v.2-7
Ballantine, William. A treatise on the statute of limitations. Albany, Packard and Co., 1829
Bridgman, Richard Whalley. A synthesis of the rules and principles of the law of nisi prius,... New York, Franklin Co., 1811
Buttmann, Philip. Greek grammar for the use of schools. Boston, Cummings, Hilliard and Co., 1826
Chitty, Joseph. A practical treatise on bills of exchange, checks on bankers, promissory notes, bankers' cash notes, and bank notes. Georgetown, Richards, 1817
Chitty, Joseph. A practical treatise on the law of nations, relative to the legal effect of war on the commerce of belligerents and neutrals... Boston, Bradford and Read, 1812
Clerke, Thomas W. A practical elementary digest of the reported cases in the Supreme Court of Judicature. New York, Gould, Banks & Co., 1841. 2d edition. 2 v. in 3
Cowen, Sidney J. A treatise on the civil jurisdiction of justices of the peace in the state of New York. Albany, Gould & Co., 1841. Pt. 1-2
Flint, Abel. A system of geometry and trigonometry together with a treatise on surveying,... 4th ed., Hartford, Cooke & Hale, 1818
Fonblanque, John. A treatise of equity with the addition of marginal references and notes. Philadelphia, Small, 1820. v.1-2
Graham, David. A treatis on the practice of the Supreme Court of the State of New York. 2d ed. New York, Gould, Banks & Co., 1836
Hall, John E. American law journal and miscellaneous repertory. Baltimore, Nicklin and Co., 1809-1810. v.2-3
Hammond, Anthony. A practical treatise on parties to actions and proceedings civil and criminal and of rights and liabilities... Exeter, N.H., G. Lamson, 1822
Hoffman, David. Legal outlines, being the substance of a course of lectures now delivering in the University of Maryland. Baltimore, E.J. Coale, 1829. v.1 only
Horace. Poemata. Novi Eboraci, G.&C.&H. Carvill, 1830

Johnson, William. A digest of the cases decided and reported in the Supreme Court of Judicature and the court for the correction of errors, in the State of New York from Jan. 1799 to Oct. 1813... Albany, E.F. Backus, 1815. Pt. 1-2
Lawes, Edward. An elementary treatise on pleading in civil actions. 1st Amer. Ed from 1st London ed. Portsmouth, N.H., Thomas and Tappan, 1808
Legendre, A. M. Elements of geometry and trigonometry... Revised and altered, New York, J. Ryan, 1828

Lube, D. G. An analysis of the principles of equity pleading, containing a compendium of the practice of the high court of chancery and the foundation of its rules. 1st Amer. From last London ed., New York, Gould, Banks & Co., 1840
New York State. The revised statutes of the State of New York. 3rd ed., Albany, W.C. Little and Co., 1846 v.1-3
New York State. Rules of practice of the Supreme Court of the State of New York, at law and in equity, as established by the court at July term, 1847. Albany, Gould, Banks & Gould, 1847
Playfair, John. Elements of geometry, containing the first six books of Euclid. Last London ed., enlarged. New York, Duyckinck, Long, etc., 1828
Roberts, William. A treatise on the law of wills and codicils. 1st Amer. From the last London ed, improved..., Exeter, N.H., G. Lamson, 1823. v. 1-2
